name: Voxel Game
description:
Special thanks to @Xenos for testing early builds before I got my ouya

Super experimental needs a lot of work!!!

Be patient with bugs I didn't have time to fix:

game might start with buttons pressed

Avoid double tapping ouya menu as it'll mess up rendering

Give world a second to load

no saving/loading for now (just not enough time)

chunk seams can be visible at times

Collisions have issues

Controls:

left stick move

right stick look

left trigger place block

right trigger break block

Left/Right bumper- cycle through blocks

O - jump

A - fly

Dpad left/right- fly up and down
